snippet.title: Jerma's Big Adventure | Steam Announcement and Release Date
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1722570/Jermas_Big_Adventure/
AVAILABLE NOW FOR FREE. GO GO GO!

Here's a link to a discord server for the game: https://discord.com/invite/gnKWbCxZeg
This is the best place to reach me about bugs or comments about the game and would also be a pretty neat place to place gnarly gamer clips, if you want to.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Oh no! Jerma985 has fallen into a spooky cavern filled with ROBOT dinosaurs and EVIL warlocks. In this wacky action-platformer, fight to escape the treacherous cavern while a live studio chat cheers you on!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Howdy Jermamites, last time I mentioned this game I said it would release in 1-2 weeks. That was a month ago. I apologize for the delay, but I thought a delay was necessary to be a proper Jerma985 project.

Stick around the Jerma reddit or discord or this youtube channel for updates. I'll probably also be making a wacky behind-the-scenes video to explain how and why this project exists.

Also, check out the first trailer for the game if you haven't: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l-8wQ1HFXDs

Note: This game is unaffiliated with Jerma985, was not commissioned by him, and does not represent his views. This is a completely free fan-project made for fun by a solo developer.

Trailer music:
Gold Rush Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
